Package org.waarp.xample


Class Summary
DlgAbout "About" dialog for the XAmple application.
FHistoryButton A simple button with drop-down menu for the XAmple application.
History A helper class for the XAmple application which holds pathes of accessed XSD and XML files.
HistoryIO A helper class for the XAmple application which reads and writes history of accessed XSD and XML files.
XAmple A simple application demonstrates usage of the Swing-based XML editing component FXDoubleView.
